abstract: Avian flu outbreak that first began in two Nigerian states travels to seven, infecting more than 140,000 birds.
lead_paragraph: An outbreak of avian flu that began in two states has spread to seven since last week and has infected more than 140,000 birds, Nigeria’s agriculture minister was quoted as saying by Nigerian news media on Thursday.
snippet: An outbreak of avian flu that began in two states has spread to seven since last week and has infected more than 140,000 birds, Nigeria’s agriculture minister was quoted as saying by Nigerian news media on Thursday.

headline.main: Nigeria: A Bird Flu Outbreak Spreads
headline.print_headline: Nigeria: A Bird Flu Outbreak Spreads
